tit.j: 京阪東ローズタウンコミュニティバス
tit.e: The Keihan East Rose Town Community Bus
The Keihan East Rose Town Community Bus
The Keihan East Rose Town Community Bus

sen.j: 京阪東ローズタウンコミュニティバス（けいはんひがしローズタウンコミュニティバス）は、京阪宇治交通が運行を開始したコミュニティバスで、現在は京阪宇治交通と合併した京阪バスが運行を継承している。
sen.e: The Keihan East Rose Town Community Bus is the bus route established by the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd., while the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. is currently managing and operating the bus route after the consolidation of the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd. into the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd..

The Keihan East Rose Town Community Bus is the bus route established by the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd., while the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. is currently managing and operating the bus route after the consolidation of the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd. into the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd..

The Keihan East Rose Town Community Bus is the bus route established by the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd., while the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. is currently managing and operating the bus route after the consolidation of the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd. into the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd..

sen.j: 路線名としては『山手線』、系統名は『東ローズタウン循環線』である。
sen.e: The commonly known nickname of this community bus service is the 'Yamate Route,' while the official name of the route is the "East Rose Town Loop-Route Bus.'
The commonly known nickname of this community bus service is the "Yamate Route," while the official name of the route is the "East Rose Town Loop-Route Bus."
sen.cmt: 原文の『』に合せて'を"に訂正しました。
sen.e: The commonly known nickname of this community bus service is the "Yamate Route," while the official name of the route is the "East Rose Town Loop-Route Bus."

sen.j: 京阪バス京田辺営業所の管轄である。
sen.e: This route is managed by the Keihan Bus Kyo-Tanabe Management Office.
This route is managed by the Keihan Bus Kyotanabe Management Office.
This route is managed by the Keihan Bus Kyotanabe Management Office.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: JR松井山手駅周辺は、京阪電気鉄道が開発した『京阪東ローズタウン』と呼ばれる住宅地が広がっており、その開発の進捗に伴い開設された。
sen.e: The residential area named 'Keihan East Rose Town' has been developed around the JR (Japan Railroad) Matsui Yamate Station by the Keihan Electric Railway Co. Ltd., and this community bus route was established along with the development of this residential area.

The residential area named "Keihan East Rose Town" has been developed around the JR (Japan Railroad) Matsui Yamate Station by the Keihan Electric Railway Co., Ltd. and this community bus route was established along with the development of this residential area.
sen.cmt: 原文の『』に合せて'を"に訂正しました。,の位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: The residential area named "Keihan East Rose Town" has been developed around the JR (Japan Railroad) Matsui Yamate Station by the Keihan Electric Railway Co., Ltd. and this community bus route was established along with the development of this residential area.

sen.j: この路線の欽明台東から欽明台北の区間が住宅地となっている。
sen.e: The residential area spreads among Kinmeidai East and Kinmeidai North bus stops.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The residential area spreads among Kinmeidai East and Kinmeidai North bus stops.
The residential area spreads among Kinmeidai East and Kinmeidai North bus stops.

sen.j: 運行形態から察するにこれらの住宅地からクレイン京都やソフィアモールへと連絡する意図をもって経路設定がなされている。
sen.e: The bus route appears to be set up for connecting this residential area to the popular locations, such as the horse riding club Crane Kyoto and Sophia Mall shopping center.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The bus route appears to be set up for connecting this residential area to the popular locations, such as the horse riding club Crane Kyoto and Sophia Mall shopping center.
The bus route appears to be set up for connecting this residential area to the popular locations, such as the horse riding club Crane Kyoto and Sophia Mall shopping center.

sen.j: 経路
sen.e: Operating route
Operating route
Operating route

sen.j: JR松井山手～欽明台東～つつじ公園前～欽明台北～（クレイン京都～）ソフィアモール～欽明台西～JR松井山手
sen.e: JR Matsui Yamate - Kinmeidai East - Azalea Park Front - Kinmeidai North - (Crane Kyoto -) Sophia Mall - Kinmeidai West - JR Matsui Yamate
JR Matsui Yamate - Kinmeidai East - Azalea Park Front - Kinmeidai North - (Crane Kyoto -) Sophia Mall - Kinmeidai West - JR Matsui Yamate
JR Matsui Yamate - Kinmeidai East - Azalea Park Front - Kinmeidai North - (Crane Kyoto -) Sophia Mall - Kinmeidai West - JR Matsui Yamate

sen.j: JR松井山手を出発して欽明台東に向かう経路が右回りである。
sen.e: Those buses departing from JR Matsui Yamate and running via Kinmeidai East is the clockwise bound of the route.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Those buses departing from JR Matsui Yamate and running via Kinmeidai East is the clockwise bound of the route.
Those buses departing from JR Matsui Yamate and running via Kinmeidai East is the clockwise bound of the route.

sen.j: JR松井山手を1430発までの運行。
sen.e: The final clockwise bound of the day departs from JR Matsui Yamate at 14:30.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The final clockwise bound of the day departs from JR Matsui Yamate at 14:30.
The final clockwise bound of the day departs from JR Matsui Yamate at 14:30.

sen.j: 以降は同じく欽明台西に向かう経路が左回りが運行される。
sen.e: After this bus, the orientation of the bus route changes to the counter-clockwise bound, and the buses depart from JR Matsui Yamate and runs via Kinmeidai West.
After this bus, the orientation of the bus route changes to the counter-clockwise bound, and the buses depart from JR Matsui Yamate and runs via Kinmeidai West.
After this bus, the orientation of the bus route changes to the counter-clockwise bound, and the buses depart from JR Matsui Yamate and runs via Kinmeidai West.

sen.j: 経路番号は以下の通りにつけられている。
sen.e: The route numbers are set up as follows;
The route numbers are set up as follows:
The route numbers are set up as follows:

sen.j: 600号経路（東ローズタウン循環右回り）
sen.e: No. 600 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Clockwise Bound
No. 600 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Clockwise Bound
No. 600 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Clockwise Bound

sen.j: 601号経路（東ローズタウン循環右回り・クレイン京都を経由するもの）
sen.e: No. 601 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Clockwise Bound via Crane Kyoto
No. 601 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Clockwise Bound via Crane Kyoto
No. 601 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Clockwise Bound via Crane Kyoto

sen.j: 610号経路（東ローズタウン循環左回り）
sen.e: No. 610 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Counter-clockwise Bound
No. 610 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Counter-clockwise Bound
No. 610 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Counter-clockwise Bound

sen.j: 611号経路（東ローズタウン循環左回り・クレイン京都を経由するもの）
sen.e: No. 610 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Counter-clockwise Bound via Crane Kyoto
No. 610 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Counter-clockwise Bound via Crane Kyoto
No. 610 Route: East Rose Town Looped Route Counter-clockwise Bound via Crane Kyoto

sen.j: 車両
sen.e: Operating vehicles
Operating vehicles
Operating vehicles

sen.j: 京田辺営業所に配備されている中型短尺車、三菱ふそう・エアロミディMJのワンステップ車の3台（内1台は交野営業所より転属したもの）と中型車が使用される。
sen.e: This community bus service uses three medium-sized, short-length 'Aero Midi MJ' buses by the Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus Corporation, with low-floor, one step entrance specification. (one of the buses was transferred from the Katano Management Office)

This community bus service uses three medium-sized, short-length 'Aero Midi MJ' buses by the Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus Corporation, with low-floor, one step entrance specification (one of the buses was transferred from the Katano Management Office.)
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: This community bus service uses three medium-sized, short-length 'Aero Midi MJ' buses by the Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus Corporation, with low-floor, one step entrance specification (one of the buses was transferred from the Katano Management Office.)

sen.j: 中型車は以前は代走程度での運用であったが2008年10月19日改正より定期運用に入るようになった。
sen.e: Although the medium sized buses had been occasionally used when a substitute bus was necessary, this irregular operation was turned into a regular service after the timetable revision made effective on October 19, 2008.

Although the medium sized buses had been occasionally used when a substitute bus was necessary, this irregular operation was turned into a regular service after the timetable revision made effective on October 19, 2008.
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: Although the medium sized buses had been occasionally used when a substitute bus was necessary, this irregular operation was turned into a regular service after the timetable revision made effective on October 19, 2008.

sen.j: これは京阪東ローズタウンコミュニティバスが一般路線の八幡市南北線と共通運用となったためである（八幡市南北線でも中型短尺車と中型車を使用）。
sen.e: This change was made because the organization for operating the Keihan East Rose Town Community Bus was altered, when the Yawata City North-South Bus Route started the joint operation of the buses. (The Yawata City North-South Bus Route also uses the same medium-sized, short-length type buses and medium-sized type buses.)
sen.cmt: この原文では、路線が共通「運営」になったのか、バスが共通運用になったのかがわかりません。この部分では車両の説明がされていますので、バスが共通運用されているものとして訳しています。
sen.e: This change was made because the organization for operating the Keihan East Rose Town Community Bus was altered, when the Yawata City North-South Bus Route started the joint operation of the buses (the Yawata City North-South Bus Route also uses the same medium-sized, short-length type buses and medium-sized type buses.)
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: This change was made because the organization for operating the Keihan East Rose Town Community Bus was altered, when the Yawata City North-South Bus Route started the joint operation of the buses (the Yawata City North-South Bus Route also uses the same medium-sized, short-length type buses and medium-sized type buses.)

sen.j: 京阪宇治交通時代には日産ディーゼル工業製の中型車が予備車であった。
sen.e: During the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd. management period, those spare vehicles for substitute operations were the medium-sized vehicles made by the Nissan Diesel Motors, Co. Ltd..
During the Keihan Uji Transport Co., Ltd. management period, those spare vehicles for substitute operations were the medium-sized vehicles made by the Nissan Diesel Motors Co., Ltd..
During the Keihan Uji Transport Co., Ltd. management period, those spare vehicles for substitute operations were the medium-sized vehicles made by the Nissan Diesel Motors Co., Ltd..

sen.j: 運賃
sen.e: Passenger fare
Passenger fare
Passenger fare

sen.j: 大人160円・小児80円（対距離区間制)
sen.e: Adult: 160 Yen/ Child: 80 Yen (the base fare; the actual fare of the service is based on the travelled distance added to the base fare)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処。括弧内、「対距離区間制」を多少説明するため、分割しました。
sen.e: Adult: 160 yen/ Child: 80 yen (the base fare; the actual fare of the service is based on the travelled distance added to the base fare.)
sen.cmt: yen 小文字に訂正しました。ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: Adult: 160 yen/ Child: 80 yen (the base fare; the actual fare of the service is based on the travelled distance added to the base fare.)

sen.j: スルッとKANSAIのプリペイドカード・京阪グループバスカードなどカードが利用できる。（なお、京阪バス1dayチケットは適用区間外である)
sen.e: Those pre-paid cards such as the 'Slutto KANSAI Pre-paid Card, the 'Keihan Group Bus Card' can be used for this bus service. (However, the 'Keihan Bus 1-day Ticket' is excluded for use)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Those pre-paid cards such as the KANSAI THRU PASS, the Keihan Group Bus Card can be used for this bus service (however, the Keihan Bus 1-day Ticket is excluded for use.)
sen.cmt: KANSAI THRU PASSに訂正しました。' '削除しました。However 小文字にしました。ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: Those pre-paid cards such as the KANSAI THRU PASS, the Keihan Group Bus Card can be used for this bus service (however, the Keihan Bus 1-day Ticket is excluded for use.)

sen.j: 定期券が発売されているが、他の路線に採用されているA表の料金ではなく、宇治田原方面で採用されるC表の料金が採用される。
sen.e: The commuter pass for this bus service is also available, but the pricing of the pass is based on the fare set up for the Uji Tawara area route, (illustrated in the price chart C) rather than the fare of the other bus routes in this area. (illustrated in the price chart A)
sen.cmt: 「〜も参照。」という句が消去されずにセル38に残っていましたので削除しました。
sen.e: The commuter pass for this bus service is also available, but the pricing of the pass is based on the fare set up for the Uji Tawara area route, (illustrated in the price chart C) rather than the fare of the other bus routes in this area (illustrated in the price chart A).
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: The commuter pass for this bus service is also available, but the pricing of the pass is based on the fare set up for the Uji Tawara area route, (illustrated in the price chart C) rather than the fare of the other bus routes in this area (illustrated in the price chart A).

sen.j: 2008年10月1日よりPiTaPaの使用が可能となった。
sen.e: From October 1, 2008, the widely used IC pre-paid bus card, 'PiTaPa Card,' can be used for this bus service.
From October 1, 2008, the widely used IC pre-paid bus card, PiTaPa Card, can be used for this bus service.
From October 1, 2008, the widely used IC pre-paid bus card, PiTaPa Card, can be used for this bus service.
